snippet: A judge on Monday sentenced one man to prison and a second to probation for their involvement in a mob attack on a motorist who accidentally struck a boy with his pickup truck in Detroit.
abstract: Michigan judge sentences one man to prison and a second to probation for their involvement in a mob attack on a motorist Steve Utash, who accidentally struck a boy with his pickup truck in Detroit.
lead_paragraph: A judge on Monday sentenced one man to prison and a second to probation for their involvement in a mob attack on a motorist who accidentally struck a boy with his pickup truck in Detroit.

headline.main: Michigan: Two Men Sentenced in Mob Attack on Truck Driver
headline.print_headline: Michigan: Two Men Sentenced in Mob Attack on Truck Driver
